label: K-Breathe
description: Displays live breathing data from the Tymewear VitalPro sensor on your Karoo. Includes VE, breathing rate, tidal volume, mobilization index, VE graph, and time-in-zones fields with FIT recording.
releaseNotes: Update to 5-zone ventilation model matching Tymewear app: drop Recovery zone, add Top Z4 zone (128 L/min default). New zone colors: teal, blue, amber, orange, red.
